PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_SpaceParkingAisle
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Properties common to the definition of all occurrences of IfcSpace which have an attribute value for ObjectType = 'ParkingAisle'.

PropertyDef.Name: IsOneWay
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether the parking aisle is designed for oneway traffic (TRUE) or twoway traffic (FALSE).
